channel.title: kerri – Baraza
channel.description: Critical Collaboration on the Middle East, South Asia, and Africa

item.title: The Future of Baraza
item.dc:creator: kerri
item.description: While we contemplate and plan for the future of Baraza we have decided to take a temporary hiatus from publishing. We look forward to returning to this online space in the Fall of 2016. Thanks for checking back at that time.
